TopicTitle: Elcano challenge - Driving through the frozen wastes (R1 Antlion)

Articles.Content:
I got nothing to do lately, so I decided to give a try to the Elcano challenge. On Eeloo.

* * *

**Goal**  **: Circumnavigating Eeloo via its poles.**

* * *

**Currently :**

Time since landing : 04:26:51

Current position : ![fa31bfb7e9.jpg](http://puu.sh/js3Xb/fa31bfb7e9.jpg)

* * *

**The vehicle** **:**

Here's the **R1 Antlion :**

![8834e147e1.png](http://puu.sh/js0R6/8834e147e1.png)

![949c729231.png](http://puu.sh/js17m/949c729231.png)

- 45 parts.

- 4,110 kg.

- 4.2m \* 5.2m \* 4.7m in size.

- 6 wheels.

- Sturdy outer casing (Crash tolerance ~ 40m.s^-1^).

- 2 communication devices.

- Internal power plant (4 PB-NUK generators).

- Scientific gear (Thermometer, accelerometer, gravioli detector, barometer, fluid spectro-variometer, 6 goo pods).

**/!\ STOCK PARTS ONLY /!\**

* * *

**Day 2**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

04:17:38 : Time to go, my planet needs me.

> ![48bf3ef0bd.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrNtH/48bf3ef0bd.jpg)

Before dawn : Went all the way back on foot to plant this f@Ã‚Â¤ÃƒÂ¹\*( ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â° ÃÅ“ÃŠâ€“ ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â°) flag to my starting point, in the middle of the crater.

> ![43aa4768e4.jpg](http://puu.sh/js2Lq/43aa4768e4.jpg)

Fortunately there was some old Compact Disk inside the rover, so I could enjoy some music.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FWO5Ai_a80M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Day 1**

01:24:39 : Almost night. I stopped the Antlion to send a message to Kerbin and get some rest. I feel lonely.

> ![281e5e05a8.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrLpT/281e5e05a8.jpg)

01:19:46 : Two tires popped. I quickly replaced them and resumed my journey.

> ![02392605dd.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrL7Q/02392605dd.jpg)

01:17:56 : I investigated a weird anomaly. The light disappeared once I tried an EVA.

> ![a11d7f7af6.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrKTv/a11d7f7af6.jpg)

> ![a446c19949.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrKXM/a446c19949.jpg)

01:07:51 : Finally on the other side. It went smoothly.

> ![e5d6f51eb2.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrHKn/e5d6f51eb2.jpg)

01:01:31 : Here it is. The huge crack.

> ![9d4136a91d.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrBRs/9d4136a91d.jpg)

00:54:56 : I'm getting near the huge ice crack.

> ![dd14bcef1e.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrAeV/dd14bcef1e.jpg)

00:24:15 : I finally made it. All the data gathered is on its way to the KSC. Second quicksave.

> ![2b9bf42dbb.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrv1W/2b9bf42dbb.jpg)

00:22:25 : The tire is back on and the Antlion is still on its way.

> ![c583f39151.jpg](http://puu.sh/jruQU/c583f39151.jpg)

00:19:59 : The crater stole one of the Antlion's tires.

> ![4c28058a1c.jpg](http://puu.sh/jruIt/4c28058a1c.jpg)

00:17:29 : Small indeed.

> ![f983d47fe9.jpg](http://puu.sh/jruAH/f983d47fe9.jpg)

00:15:48 : The Antlion approaches the crater's edge. I suddenly feel a bit small.

> ![127393df6b.jpg](http://puu.sh/jruvM/127393df6b.jpg)

00:09:09 : Bill is hungry. The Antlion is still in the crater.

> ![c777fdccab.jpg](http://puu.sh/jru9T/c777fdccab.jpg)
> 

00:05:36 : First quicksave and science gathering. I'm starting to feel alone on this dead rock.

> ![8f00489064.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrtYz/8f00489064.jpg)

00:03:33 : The Antlion begins to move towards the north pole.

> ![af87d92ecd.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrtSv/af87d92ecd.jpg)
> 

**00:00:00** **:** Landing in Eeloo's main crater. Bill Kerman forgot to plant a flag and I forgot to take a picture.

> ![f52356a517.jpg](http://puu.sh/jrva2/f52356a517.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T22:30:56Z" title="08/06/2015 10:30  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by LethalShade**
Seems like a promising project, good luck!

Day 1 is over. I'm waiting for the sun. Things went way more smoothly than first expected. The Antlion is sturdy enough to take quite a beating without losing any part, and microgravity is not hard to cope with.
